import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import './ProductDisplay.css'; import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png'; import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png'; import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const { product } = props; const { addToCart } = useContext(ShopContext); const [selectedSize, setSelectedSize] = useState(''); // State untuk menyimpan ukuran yang dipilih // Fungsi untuk menangani pemilihan ukuran const handleSizeSelection = (size) => { setSelectedSize(size); }; return (

{product.name}

(122)

Rp{product.old_price}
Rp{product.new_price}
A lightweight, usually knitted, pullover shirt, close fitting and a a round neckline short

Select Size

{/* Menambahkan event onClick untuk memilih ukuran */}
handleSizeSelection('S')}> S
handleSizeSelection('M')}> M
handleSizeSelection('L')}> L
handleSizeSelection('XL')}> XL
handleSizeSelection('XXL')}> XXL
{/* Tombol "ADD TO CART" dengan pemilihan ukuran */}

Category : Women, T-Shirt, Crop Top

Tags : Modern, Latest

); }; export default ProductDisplay;
